title: Came late for dhuhr congregation, can I pray all sunnah prayers together after fard? Assim al hakeem
transcript: but from india he says if i came late for congregation and i joined the imam can i pray the four raqqa of that's prior to the fart and the torah afterwards together the answer is yes but if you mean together by praying six raka's with one salam at the end no this is not permissible you have to pray two offer salam two offer salam and two then offer salam
